DOC.brief_summary: This study compare ZD1839 ( 250mg 500mg ) versus methotrexate head neck cancer term overall survival .
DOC.brief_title: Head Neck Phase III Iressa Versus Methotrexate Refractory : Iressa Versus Methotrexate ( IMEX )
DOC.criteria: Histological confirmation evidence squamous cell carcinoma head neck . Tumors progress primary treatment radiation chemoradiation fail respond least one course standard platinumbased chemotherapy . Tumors progress primary treatment radiation chemoradiation consider unsuitable platinumbased chemotherapy . Carcinomas postnasal space , thyroid , sinus salivary gland tumor . Isolated recurrent disease may amenable local therapy ; e.g. , surgical intervention radiation therapy . Known severe hypersensitivity ZD1839 , Methotrexate excipients product .
